Package repository

Class RecordsRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository
repository.RecordsRepository
public class RecordsRepository extends Repository
RecordsRepository class for managing all records in the system such as payment records, medical records, appointment records.

    • loadFromCSV

      public boolean loadFromCSV()
      Loads all record types from their respective CSV files and sets the repository as loaded.
      Specified by:
      loadFromCSV in class Repository
      Returns:
      true if all records are successfully loaded; false otherwise

      private static <T extends Records> void saveRecordsToCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,T> recordsMapRecordID)
      Saves a specific record map to a CSV file.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type parameter extending Records
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to save records to
      recordsMapRecordID - the map of records to save

    • recordToCSV

      private static String recordToCSV(Records record)
      Converts a record object to a CSV-formatted string.
      Parameters:
      record - the record object to convert
      Returns:
      a CSV-formatted string representing the record

    • loadRecordsFromCSV

      private static <T extends Records> void loadRecordsFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,T> recordsMapRecordID, Class<T> type)
      Loads records from a CSV file into the specified records map.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type parameter extending Records
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      recordsMapRecordID - the map to store the loaded records
      type - the class type of record to load (e.g., MedicalRecord, Appointment)

    • csvToRecord

      private static <T extends Records> T csvToRecord(String csv, Class<T> type)
      Converts a CSV line to a record object of the specified type.
      Type Parameters:
      T - a type parameter extending Records
      Parameters:
      csv - the CSV string representing the record
      type - the class type of record to create (e.g., MedicalRecord, Appointment)
      Returns:
      a record object of the specified type, or null if parsing fails

    • isRepoLoaded

      public static Boolean isRepoLoaded()
      Checks if the repository has been loaded.
      Returns:
      true if the repository is loaded; false otherwise

    • setRepoLoaded

      public static void setRepoLoaded(Boolean isRepoLoaded)
      Sets the repository load status.
      Parameters:
      isRepoLoaded - true to set the repository as loaded, false otherwise

    • updateDoctorIDInMedicalRecord

      public static boolean updateDoctorIDInMedicalRecord(String medicalRecordID, String newDoctorID)
      Updates the doctor ID in the specified medical record.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecordID - the ID of the medical record to update
      newDoctorID - the new doctor ID to set
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
